mapper.select: SELECT * FROM media_info A, ( SELECT caption_id, question_id FROM project_info WHERE gid = #{projectId} ) b WHERE A .gid = b.caption_id OR A .gid = b.question_id
SELECT A .*, b.develop, b. NAME project_name, b.desc_pic FROM (SELECT * FROM app_face ORDER BY index) A, project_info b WHERE A .project_id = b.gid
mapper.insert: insert into project_info ( name,disnum,description, develop,keyword,price, address,commission,header, tel,back_time,state, remark,type,report_limit, bidding_begin,bidding_end ) values ( #{project.name},#{project.disnum},#{project.description}, #{project.develop},#{project.keyword},#{project.price}, #{project.address},#{project.commission},#{project.header}, #{project.tel},#{project.backTime},#{project.state}, #{project.remark},#{project.type},#{project.reportLimit}, #{project.biddingBegin},#{project.biddingEnd} )
